resources.string:
This application is a mobile game platformer. 
 
It consists of an android (the player) moving around from platform to platform to avoid falling and dying. This causes the game to automatically quit. 
 
The goal is to get the highest score possible by not dying. 
 
The android will automatically jump when it comes in contact with a platform, all the player has to do is line up the android with the platform as it falls down.
